result.detailedDescription: Cloud based in memory database platform. It is an in-memory database that stores data on disk. It provides in memory data store that acts as a cache, vector database, document database, and streaming engine. The platform supports data types such as sets, strings, hashes, lists, and more.
result.shortDescription: Cloud based in memory database platform
result.name: Redis

result.detailedDescription: Fender is a manufacturer of stringed instruments and amplifiers. It introduced electric guitars Telecaster, Stratocaster, Jaguar, Jazzmaster, Mustang, Precision Bass and Jazz Bass. It also makes acoustic guitars, electric basses and amplifier. The company name is derived from its founder's name Leo Fender. It manufactures its guitars at Corona, California and Ensenada, Mexico. The guitars were used by Eric Clapton and Jeff Beck. Customer can buy customised guitar from its website.
result.shortDescription: Manufacturer of stringed instruments and amplifiers
result.name: Fender

otherTaxonomy.name: Trending Themes in Renewable Energy Tech

result.detailedDescription: Outdoor and off-grid charging, cooking, and lighting solutions provider, offering a range of innovative products for outdoor enthusiasts and those seeking off-grid power solutions. The company provides power banks, power stations, solar generators, solar panels, chargers, and cables to keep devices charged in any environment. Lighting solutions include headlamps, rechargeable lanterns, area lights, and solar string lights, catering to various lighting needs. For cooking and cooling, they offer camp stoves, electric coolers, fire pits, and rocket stoves. The company focuses on sustainability and social impact, aiming to provide energy access to communities in need. They offer a variety of products for camping, preparedness, and backyard fun. The company also provides product support, troubleshooting, and warranty services. They have a rewards program and affiliate program.
result.shortDescription: Outdoor and off-grid charging, cooking, and lighting solutions provider
result.name: BioLite

result.detailedDescription: Vertically integrated company that manufactures solar power electronics and provides solar EPC services. Products include solar PCUs, solar inverters, energy storage systems, string inverters, off-grid inverters, cold inverters, string combiner boxes, battery chargers, integrated power supply systems, distribution boards and others. Also provides solar EPC services on a distributed scale.

otherTaxonomy.name: Trending Themes in Life Sciences Tech

result.detailedDescription: Stratos Genomics, a spin-off of Seattle-based Stratos Group is engaged in the development of a nanopore-based single molecule sequencer. The company's technology "Sequencing By Expansion (SBX)" allows conversion of DNA into an easily-read polymer or xpandomer, using a process similar to replication via polymerase. Further, it uses a modified polymerase which incorporates strings of four complementary bases called "Xprobes". The 4-base oligos,  have four reporter molecules attached between the 2nd and 3rd base that helps in maintaining the normal steric properties of a 4-mer oligo. The xpandomer is melted off the template strand, expanding to 50-times the size of the original target DNA molecule and further threaded through a solid state nanopore which reads off the sequence as represented by the reporter molecules.
result.name: Stratos Genomics

investors.name: Karnataka Information Technology Venture Capital Fund

result.detailedDescription: Innovating sustainable solutions for animal, human nutrition, and agriculture, leveraging cutting-edge technology to redefine manufacturing and enable resilient food systems. The company focuses on making sustainability market-relevant through cost-effective and high-performance products. It utilizes a strong IP-protected platform that integrates synthetic biology, chemistry, process engineering, and fermentation. The company addresses challenges in animal nutrition, human nutrition, agriculture, and emerging markets by developing next-generation ingredients. Driven by a team with expertise in technology development, scale-up, and commercialization, it is committed to sustainable development goals, optimizing costs, and delivering exceptional products. The company uses engineering, biology, and chemistry to create scalable and economical solutions. It operates a gas fermentation platform, transforming carbon into protein and disrupting large businesses with its deep technology platform.

result.shortDescription: Innovating sustainable solutions for animal, human nutrition, and agriculture

otherTaxonomy.name: Trending Themes in Life Sciences Tech

result.detailedDescription: Developer of viral-vector-based vaccines for the treatment of cancer. It has two product candidates which include Endovax, an antigen-less vaccine, is based on oncolytic viruses capable of infecting and replicating only in cancer cells and causing immunogenic cell death, thereby recruiting T cells at the tumor site and reactivating T cells exhausted in the tumor micro-environment. Exovax is a personalized patient-specific vaccine, based on viral vectors coding for strings of cancer neo-antigens to induce and expand cancer and patient-specific T cells.
result.shortDescription: Developer of viral-vector-based vaccines for the treatment of cancer
result.name: Nouscom

result.detailedDescription: Bladena is a leading manufacturer and distributor of wind turbine blades. Have been developing new designs and technologies to increase the efficiency and performance of the blades by reducing the formation of cracks at higher wind speeds. Product range includes a variety of blades each with a new design and new technology. Products are supplied under the brand names "D-Stiffener", "D-String", "X-Stiffener", "Floor", and "Cap-Stiffener". All the technologies have been patented.
result.shortDescription: Manufacturer and distributor of turbine blades
result.name: Bladena

result.detailedDescription: Manufacturer of infrastructure solutions for energy and material transport. It designs, manufactures, and sells products and integrated solutions for the construction, maintenance, and efficiency of infrastructures related to energy, data, and material transport. The product portfolio includes rock trenching equipment, surface miners, stringing equipment, railway equipment, and electronic devices for smart grid management. The company focuses on providing solutions to drive growth and modernization in these sectors, leveraging technological advancements for efficiency and grid management. Its business model emphasizes a global presence with local market focus to best meet customer needs.
result.shortDescription: Manufacturer of infrastructure solutions for energy and material transport

result.detailedDescription: GenapSys is a provider of DNA sequencing technologies for applied genomic testing and medical sequencing. It has developed Gene Electronic Nano-Integrated Ultra-Sensitive that is a chip based portable DNA sequencing technologies. The areas of application include Research, Diagnostics, Drug Development, Agriculture, Forensic, and Personal.
result.shortDescription: Provider of DNA sequencing technologies for applied genomic testing and medical sequencing
